pageContext.claim: “ICE’s Operation Matador recently led to the arrest of 325 members of MS-13 -- a vicious, violent, horrible gang.  Horrible group of people.  And we’re throwing them the hell out of our country so fast, your head would spin.  But too many were allowed in...[ICE is] actually liberating towns [on Long Island].”
pageContext.analysis: A snapshot of just two of the eight years of the previous administration shows Trump's claim is false. ICE deported 2,057 individuals suspected or confirmed to be gang members in fiscal year 2016, and 1,040 individuals in fiscal year 2015. Since May 2017, when Operation Matador began, ICE reports 274 arrests of MS-13 members, not 325.
